body: Spike Dropseed        Spike Dropseed NPS       Spike Dropseed is a perennial bunchgrass that grows as tall as 48 inches. It grows during the late spring through the fall. Flowering occurs from June to October It has a dense contracted spike like seed cluster. It’s typical elevation range is 2500 to 6500 feet.
title: Pipe Spring National Monument: Spike Dropseed
